title: Chicken tagine with caramelised pears
ingredients: ['2 onions, peeled and sliced', '7 tablespoons olive oil, divided', '1 whole chicken, cut into pieces', '1 teaspoon ground turmeric', '1 teaspoon ground cumin', '1 teaspoon ground coriander', '1 teaspoon salt', '2-3 cinnamon sticks', '2 bay leaves', '1 bunch freshly chopped coriander', '2 tablespoons freshly minced ginger', '125ml water', '30g butter', '2 pears, cored and sliced', '2 tablespoons honey']
